getEncodedNodeName

public static String getEncodedNodeName(ZooKeeperWatcher zkw,
                                        String filename)
Gets the full path node name for the log file being split. This method will url encode the filename.

Parameters:
zkw - zk reference
filename - log file name (only the basename)
